content: I am floating the idea of having a broad IHE-on-FHIR track at the January HL7 FHIR Connectathon. This would explicitly NOT duplicate the more focused tracks, but would give a chance for this audience to use the IHE Connectathon tooling developed for IHE Profiles using FHIR. Anyone interested? This broad track is expected to narrow based on WHO signs up. So this Zulip stream-track should be used to show interest, and help focus on a reasonable subset of the 20 IHE Profiles of FHIR. See http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=201801_IHE-on-FHIR as the working space for this FHIR connectathon track.
Those going to FHIR Connectathon in New Orleans; and wanting to test IHE Profiles of FHIR. Please see the IHE-on-FHIR track. http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=201801_IHE-on-FHIR
Hi @John Moehrke Can you please add a subtrack for MHD, we will test our brand new server if possible.

Diego, there is a sub-track in IHE-on-FHIR for MHD testing. Essentially this track includes ALL of the IHE profiles of FHIR, except for those that are being tested by other tracks . So all are welcome.
